Indexes representing the increase of interest over time are pulled from an oracle. borrow(ILender.LenderStorage storage,ILe.details: Interest debt token is updated before principal token is minted to bring index up to date. Restaker debt token is updated after so the new principal debt can be used in calculations

realizeRestakerInterest(ILender.LenderSt.details: If more interest is owed than available in the vault then some portion is unrealized and added to the agent's debt to be paid during repayments.

params._asset: Asset to realize restaker interest for

repay(ILender.LenderStorage storage,ILen.details: Only the amount owed or specified will be taken from the repayer, whichever is lower. Interest is expected to have been realized so is included in the reserve debt. Once reserve debt is paid down the remaining amount is sent to the fee auction.

borrow(ILender.LenderStorage storage,ILe.notice: Borrow an asset from the Lender, minting a debt token which must be repaid

realizeInterest(ILender.LenderStorage st.notice: Realize the interest before it is repaid by borrowing from the vault

realizeRestakerInterest(ILender.LenderSt.notice: Realize the restaker interest before it is repaid by borrowing from the vault

repay(ILender.LenderStorage storage,ILen.notice: Repay an asset, burning the debt token and/or paying down interest
